entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as the location where a mysterious disturbance occurred. ("during which He Who Must Not Be Named was sighted once more at the Ministry of Magic")

entities.name: he who must not be named
entities.description: He Who Must Not Be Named is mentioned as being sighted during the disturbance. ("during which He Who Must Not Be Named was sighted once more at the Ministry of Magic")
